thinking: The strategy is to start harvesting with one worker, train workers from the base, and have all other units attack the enemy base. Since this is turn 0 and we only have a base, the only possible move is to train a worker.

Prioritize assigning a worker to harvest resources. Then, attack the enemy base with the remaining worker. Since we don't have a barracks, we can't train combat units yet. The base will try to train a new worker if possible.
Okay, I need to assign one worker to harvest, and the other units should attack the enemy base. The base should train a worker if possible.
Prioritize aggression after securing 1 harvester. All other units should attack the enemy as fast as possible. Base keeps training new workers.
Prioritize harvesting with one worker and attack with the other. Base trains a worker.
